channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX, Jetson TX1, Jetson Nano series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX, Jetson TX1, Jetson Nano series

item.title: CVE-2024-0108|2024-08-09T15:48:50.071Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx1%2C%20jetson%20nano%20series
item.description: NVIDIA Jetson Linux contains a vulnerability in NvGPU where error handling paths in GPU MMU mapping code fail to clean up a failed mapping attempt. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to denial of service, code execution, and escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-0108|2024-08-08T16:18:27.914Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx1%2C%20jetson%20nano%20series
item.description: NVIDIA Jetson Linux contains a vulnerability in NvGPU where error handling paths in GPU MMU mapping code fail to clean up a failed mapping attempt. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to denial of service, code execution, and escalation of privileges.
